reviewText: Borderland, will make you think about wandering  off in a strange place and not being sober. Based on true events, really worth the watch
The double feature on this Blu-ray are ok.  I've seen worse.  It has a lot of character actors you may recognize.
Borderland is mad tension. It builds and shocks from start to finish. With the current drug war waging south of the border this movie is not only plausible but probable.
